name: PopAd
author: Alobaidi

sections.description:
PopAd

The Ultimate PopUp Ads Plugin! With a Lot of Features.. Discover it by yourself.

The Features

  1. Create PopUp Ads easily.
  2. Unlimited PopUp Ads.
  3. PopUp Ads different for every post or page or any custom post type.
  4. General PopUp Ad (display popup ad on the entire website, all pages, all posts, homepage, etc).
  5. Media PopUp: YouTube PopUp, Vimeo PopUp, SoundCloud PopUp.
  6. Autoplay option for Media PopUp (youTube, vimeo, soundcloud).
  7. Responsive Design.
  8. Compatible with Preloader.
  9. AdSense Extension.
  10. Anti AdBlock Extension.
  11. Statistics of Impressions (unique).
  12. Custom time for every PopUp Ad.
  13. Exclusion Options (for example exclude homepage, exclude editor user, etc).
  14. Easy to use.
  15. And more features!.

Live Demo & Usage & Screenshots & YouTube Video

  • http://wp-plugins.in/PopAd_Plugin

Rate The Plugin

  • Please rate PopAd plugin

More Plugins

  • My Plugins
sections.installation:
Installation

  1. Upload ‘popad’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Read Explanation of Use
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Installation

  1. Upload ‘popad’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Read Explanation of Use

FAQ

  • Read explanation of use
  • For more questions or help, contact me.
  • Or on twitter.
sections.changelog:
1.0.4

  1. A new option: Rel nofollow (optional).
  2. Improve display the advertisements.

Read about version 1.0.4 Read section of Version 1.0.4 at end of the post.

1.0.3

  • Fixing a problem in PHP Session.

1.0.2

  1. Remove PopAd from Nav Menu (../wp-admin/nav-menus.php).
  2. Improve the banner link filter.

1.0.1

  • Fix add rel=”nofollow” for “Advertisement Link”.

1.0.0

  • First version.
